ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: My guild can t do Vox or Naggy straight up because almost all of us are above level 52.  I m curious if anyone can give me some guidance on how level 53+
ygData.messageBody:
My guild can't do Vox or Naggy straight up because almost all of us are above level 52. I'm curious if
anyone can give me some guidance on how level 53+ characters can contribute to a Vox/Naggy raid without
being tossed (or with being tossed, if that's useful). I don't understand the mechanics of when someone
is tossed and when they aren't. We have a couple of small guild allies that we could use as front men.

Also, does anyone have links to any good information on taking down the Kunark dragons? We haven't done
any of them yet; everyone keeps saying we have too few high levels (50 over level 53 doesn't seem that
weak to me, but what do I know? We have about 5 level 60s now.)

I'm never getting this epic weapon, we have too many warriors, and two Bards in front of me. But it's
nice to dream.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs, Innoruuk



jay schultze wrote:

> Creediki[FoH] just got his Singing Short Sword a few days before the patch
> went in. It's pretty damn sweet, and moreso now that it acts as a universal
> instrument. He tested it on different songs and found that it is
> substantially less powerful as an instrument than selo'd drums or kelin's
> lute, but it still amplifies pretty well. I'm sure someone will post some
> stats on how it stacks up verses our normal instruments.
>
> I'm currently 1 white scale away from getting my SSS. We've been killing Vox
> weekly, but she has not been very generous with scales. If you want to see a
> CRAP loot load, you should have been present yesterday when ALL she dropped
> was 4 frozen paladin books. Today she dropped 2 RBB's, a bracer, and a
> crystal spear so she kinda made up for that faux pax, but STILL NO
> SCALES...grr...
>
> Oh well. If Shada or anyone else with an SSS posts some instrument-tests I'm
> sure we'd all be curious to see how it does. =P
>
> Sartori{Legion}
> 57th Karaoke Singer, Veeshan
